title: Ticket #1300: JobRouter (quill) fails on platforms with unsigned char
description:
The quill classad log parser fails on platforms with unsigned char. The problem is that the comparison to EOF was never true, because EOF is -1 but the value returned from fgetc() was being stored in a char buffer.

This was causing JobRouter to hang and/or crash on ppc64_sles9, ppc_aix_5.2, and ps3_ydl_5.0.

I am fixing this in 7.5 because I am not aware of a pressing need for it in 7.4.
